com.strandgenomics.imaging.icore.image
Class PixelArray

java.lang.Object
  com.strandgenomics.imaging.icore.image.PixelArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
Disposable, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PixelArray.Byte, PixelArray.Float, PixelArray.Integer, PixelArray.Short
public abstract class PixelArray
extends Object
implements Serializable, Disposable

Represents the raw pixel data

Author:
arunabha
See Also:

overlay

public abstract void overlay(PixelArray another)
Overlay with another pixel array - the overlay is done for each pixel values if pixel value at the ith position of this PixelArray is less than the given PixelArray it is overwritten with the pixel value from the given PixelArray. Note, the type must match and this operation will mutate this PixelArray

Parameters:
another - another pixel array of the same depth

computeIntensityDistribution

public abstract Histogram computeIntensityDistribution()
Scan the pixels and compute the intensity distribution

Returns:
the intensity distribution of this PixelData

getSubArray

public abstract PixelArray getSubArray(int x,
                                       int y,
                                       int width,
                                       int height)
Creates a sub-image with the specified bounds

Parameters:
x - the X coordinate of the upper-left corner of the specified rectangular region
y - the Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the specified rectangular region
width - the width of the specified rectangular region
height - the height of the specified rectangular region
Returns:
a sub-image with the specified bounds
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the specified area is not contained within this PixelArray.
